markdown:
**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 18 2.0 --- You have a habit of always being in the way when other creatures attempt to move. Attempt an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check against an adjacent creature's Reflex DC. **Critical Success** The target creature gains a –2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves and is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of your next turn.
**Success** The target creature gains a –2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves until the start of your next turn.
name: Catfolk Dance
